entities.name: hagger
entities.description: Hagger is a person who yells 'HAGGER!' to alert others.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is the leader of the Death Eaters and has giants at his command.

entities.name: grawp
entities.description: Grawp is a giant who is being attacked by Voldemort's giants.

entities.name: neville
entities.description: Neville is a person who breaks free from the Body-Bind Curse and fights against Voldemort's forces.

relationships.description: Hagger alerts Voldemort that Neville has broken free.
Neville saves Grawp from being attacked by Voldemort's giants.
